data.text: @christopherhope Someone who demonstrates on a daily basis his lack of judgement and tetchy childlike response to criticism should get more kip. Sleep deprivation and fondness for the bottle (not Actimel) don’t help!
@christopherhope And yet he achieved so little. 🤷‍♂️
@christopherhope Oh for goodness sake Christopher. Why, why are you so supine in the face of such naked exceptionalism but demonstrable ineptness??

@christopherhope "the end of the Covid crisis"

The 'crisis' is what we now face, out of control inflation, soaring energy + fuel bills, tax rises, commodity shortages, NHS access, GP and dentist access, affordable homes, jobs etc, all created in the name of Covid, incompetence or by design????!
@christopherhope He has had plenty of downtime along the way though, free holidays, wallpaper shopping, tennis with Russians and who can forget partygate. We haven't forgotten partygate.
@Spangleboots1 @christopherhope You need to get a life really people are dying, and you got to come out with crap like that

@christopherhope Tory propaganda and BS from right wing rag and pips for the conservative friends of putin party.

Nurses, paramedics, doctors get just 5 hours off, Johnson has multiple parties and is on the piss most of the time. #partygate
